Symbol.Script_1D:
! iWindowType: WIN_W1 = 1 WIN_WDoubleSash = 2 WIN_W2 = 3 WIN_W2Sidelight = 4 WIN_W3 = 5 WIN_W32Sidelights1 = 6 WIN_W32Sidelights2 = 7 WIN_WVariable = 8 WIN_WVariableDoubleSash = 9 WIN_HistoricWindowSingle2 = 10 WIN_HistoricWindowSingle = 11 WIN_HistoricWindowDouble = 12 WIN_HistoricWindowTriple = 13 WIN_HistoricWindowSegmented = 14 WIN_HistoricWindowTripleArched = 15 WIN_W2HorizontalSlide = 16 WIN_W4HorizontalSlide = 17 WIN_Curved = 18 WIN_Bow = 19 WIN_SplayBay = 20 WIN_SquareBay = 21 WIN_Ribbon = 22 WIN_WSingleHung1 = 23 WIN_WSingleHung2 = 24 WIN_WSingleHung3 = 25 WIN_WDoubleHung1 = 26 WIN_WDoubleHung2 = 27 WIN_WDoubleHung3 = 28 WIN_WRound = 29 WIN_WOval = 30 WIN_WMultiside = 31 WIN_WHalfRound = 32 WIN_WQuarterRound = 33 WIN_WPentagon = 34 WIN_WTriangle = 35 WIN_WEyebrows = 36 WIN_WArched = 37 WIN_WTrapezoid = 38 WIN_WTrapezoidDoubleSash = 39 WIN_VentWindow = 40 WIN_2SashSliding = 41 WIN_MultisashHorizontal = 42 WIN_MultisashVertical = 43 WIN_GlassBlock = 44 WIN_TerraceDoorSWE = 45 WIN_W3HorizontalSlide = 46 WIN_W6HorizontalSlide = 47 WIN_VentilationBrick = 48 WIN_Rhomb = 49 WIN_Skewed = 50 DOOR_NoSidelight = 100 DOOR_OneSidelight = 101 DOOR_TwoSidelight = 102
! iMullionStyle: MULLION_NONE = 1 MULLION_HVGRID = 2 MULLION_EDITABLEGRID = 3 MULLION_CUSTOM = 4 MULLION_PRAIRIE = 5 MULLION_DIVIDED = 6 MULLION_SUNBURST_1 = 7 MULLION_SUNBURST_2 = 8 MULLION_SUNBURST_3 = 9 MULLION_SUNBURST_4 = 10 MULLION_SUNBURST_5 = 11 MULLION_SUNBURST_6 = 12 MULLION_SOLID_GLAZED = 13 MULLION_DIVIDED_FRAME = 14 MULLION_SOLID_PANEL = 15 MULLION_VENT_PANEL = 16 MULLION_FRENCH_PANEL = 17
! gs_optype_m: SASH_FIXED = 1 ! Fixed Glass SASH_FIXED_SCREW = 2 ! Fixed Sash SASH_SIDE_HUNG = 3 ! Side Hung SASH_SIDE_HUNG_M = 4 ! Side Hung Mirrored SASH_TILT_TURN = 5 ! Tilt and Turn SASH_TILT_TURN_M = 6 ! Tilt and Turn Mirrored SASH_BOTTOM_HUNG = 7 ! Bottom Hung SASH_TOP_HUNG = 8 ! Top Hung SASH_HOR_PIVOT = 9 ! Horizontal Pivot Hung SASH_VER_PIVOT = 10 ! Vertical Pivotted SASH_TILT_SLIDE = 11 ! Tilt and Slide SASH_LEFT_SLIDING = 12 ! Left Sliding SASH_RIGHT_SLIDING = 13 ! Right Sliding SASH_UP_SLIDING = 14 ! Sliding Up SASH_DOWN_SLIDING = 15 ! Sliding Down SASH_VER_PIVOT_M = 16 ! Vertical Pivotted Mirrored SASH_FIXED_SLIDE = 17 ! Fixed Sliding Sash SASH_DOUBLE_SIDE_HUNG = 18 ! Double Sash SASH_DOUBLE_TILT_TURN = 19 ! Double Tilt and Turn SASH_DOUBLE_TILT_TURN_M = 20 ! Double Tilt and Turn Mirrored SASH_SLIDING_HOR = 21 ! Sliding SASH_SLIDING_HOR_M = 22 ! Sliding Mirrored SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR = 23 ! Double Sliding SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR_M = 24 ! Double Sliding Mirrored SASH_SLIDING_VER = 25 ! Single Hung SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_VER = 26 ! Double Hung
! Edit Sash/gs_sash_set_to_edit: SET_TRANSOM = 1 SET_SIDELIGHT_1 = 2 SET_SIDELIGHT_2 = 3 SET_TRANSOM_1 = 4 SET_TRANSOM_2 = 5 SET_MAIN_SASH = 6 SET_LOWER_SASH = 7 SET_LOWER_SASH_1 = 8 SET_LOWER_SASH_2 = 9
! ============================================================================= ! ! =============================================================================
! It has to be consistent with the sashName array dim sashID[][8] ! sashID[i][1]: Sash function ! sashID[i][2]: Casement ID from CasementIDArray[][]
SASH_FUNCTION = 1 SASH_ID = 2
if iWindowType = WIN_MultisashHorizontal |\ iWindowType = WIN_MultisashVertical then
for i = 1 to 10 sashID[i][SASH_FUNCTION] = i * (i < (gs_panes_number + 1)) sashID[i][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[1][i] next i else if iWindowType = WIN_W2HorizontalSlide |\ iWindowType = WIN_W3HorizontalSlide |\ iWindowType = WIN_W4HorizontalSlide |\ iWindowType = WIN_W6HorizontalSlide then
_idx = 1 sashID[_idx][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_MAIN_SASH * (CasementIDArray[2][1] > 0) sashID[_idx][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[2][1] _idx = _idx + 1 sashID[_idx][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_MAIN_SASH * (CasementIDArray[2][2] > 0) sashID[_idx][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[2][2] _idx = _idx + 1
if iWindowType = WIN_W3HorizontalSlide | iWindowType = WIN_W4HorizontalSlide then sashID[_idx][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_MAIN_SASH * (CasementIDArray[2][3] > 0) sashID[_idx][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[2][3] _idx = _idx + 1 endif
if iWindowType = WIN_W4HorizontalSlide then sashID[_idx][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_MAIN_SASH * (CasementIDArray[2][4] > 0) sashID[_idx][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[2][4] _idx = _idx + 1 endif
if iWindowType = WIN_W6HorizontalSlide then sashID[_idx][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_MAIN_SASH * (CasementIDArray[2][5] > 0) sashID[_idx][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[2][5] _idx = _idx + 1
sashID[_idx][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_MAIN_SASH * (CasementIDArray[2][6] > 0) sashID[_idx][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[2][6] _idx = _idx + 1 endif
if iWindowType = WIN_W3HorizontalSlide |\ iWindowType = WIN_W4HorizontalSlide then sashID[_idx][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_TRANSOM * (CasementIDArray[1][1] > 0 & gs_UTrans) sashID[_idx][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[1][1] _idx = _idx + 1
sashID[_idx][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_TRANSOM * (CasementIDArray[1][2] > 0 & gs_UTrans) sashID[_idx][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[1][2] _idx = _idx + 1
sashID[_idx][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_TRANSOM * (CasementIDArray[1][3] > 0 & gs_UTrans) sashID[_idx][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[1][3] _idx = _idx + 1 endif if iWindowType = WIN_W4HorizontalSlide then sashID[_idx][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_TRANSOM * (CasementIDArray[1][4] > 0 & gs_UTrans) sashID[_idx][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[1][4] _idx = _idx + 1 endif
for _i = _idx to 10 sashID[_i][SASH_FUNCTION] = 0 sashID[_i][SASH_ID] = 0 next _i else sashID[1][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_MAIN_SASH * (CasementIDArray[2][2] > 0) sashID[1][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[2][2]
sashID[2][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_SIDELIGHT_1 * (CasementIDArray[2][3] > 0 & gs_bSLight) sashID[2][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[2][3]
sashID[3][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_SIDELIGHT_2 * (CasementIDArray[2][1] > 0 & gs_bLeftSLight) sashID[3][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[2][1]
sashID[4][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_LOWER_SASH * (CasementIDArray[3][2] > 0 & gs_LTrans) sashID[4][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[3][2]
sashID[5][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_LOWER_SASH_1 * (CasementIDArray[3][3] > 0 & gs_LTrans & gs_LTrans_Div) sashID[5][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[3][3]
sashID[6][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_LOWER_SASH_2 * (CasementIDArray[3][1] > 0 & gs_LTrans & gs_LTrans_Div) sashID[6][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[3][1]
sashID[7][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_TRANSOM * (CasementIDArray[1][2] > 0 & gs_UTrans) sashID[7][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[1][2]
sashID[8][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_TRANSOM_1 * (CasementIDArray[1][3] > 0 & gs_UTrans & gs_UTrans_Div) sashID[8][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[1][3]
sashID[9][SASH_FUNCTION] = SET_TRANSOM_2 * (CasementIDArray[1][1] > 0 & gs_UTrans & gs_UTrans_Div) sashID[9][SASH_ID] = CasementIDArray[1][1]
sashID[10][SASH_FUNCTION] = 0 sashID[10][SASH_ID] = 0 endif endif
! ============================================================================= ! Check Opening Type ! =============================================================================
bOnlyFixedSashes = 1 bHideSashAttr = 1 for ii = 1 to 10 if sashID[ii][SASH_ID] > 0 & sashID[ii][SASH_FUNCTION] > 0 then CasementID = sashID[ii][SASH_ID]
gs_optype_m = 0 iMullionStyle = 0 if CasementID = 1 then gs_optype_m = gs_optype_m_01 iMullionStyle = iMullionStyle_01 endif if CasementID = 2 then gs_optype_m = gs_optype_m_02 iMullionStyle = iMullionStyle_02 endif if CasementID = 3 then gs_optype_m = gs_optype_m_03 iMullionStyle = iMullionStyle_03 endif if CasementID = 4 then gs_optype_m = gs_optype_m_04 iMullionStyle = iMullionStyle_04 endif if CasementID = 5 then gs_optype_m = gs_optype_m_05 iMullionStyle = iMullionStyle_05 endif if CasementID = 6 then gs_optype_m = gs_optype_m_06 iMullionStyle = iMullionStyle_06 endif if CasementID = 7 then gs_optype_m = gs_optype_m_07 iMullionStyle = iMullionStyle_07 endif if CasementID = 8 then gs_optype_m = gs_optype_m_08 iMullionStyle = iMullionStyle_08 endif if CasementID = 9 then gs_optype_m = gs_optype_m_09 iMullionStyle = iMullionStyle_09 endif if CasementID = 10 then gs_optype_m = gs_optype_m_10 iMullionStyle = iMullionStyle_10 endif if CasementID = 11 then gs_optype_m = gs_optype_m_11 iMullionStyle = iMullionStyle_11 endif
bOnlyFixedSashes = min(bOnlyFixedSashes, (gs_optype_m = SASH_FIXED)) bHideSashAttr = min(bHideSashAttr, bOnlyFixedSashes, ((iMullionStyle = MULLION_NONE | iMullionStyle = MULLION_CUSTOM))) endif next ii
! ============================================================================= ! Check Mullion Style ! =============================================================================
if gs_sash_uniform then CasementID = 0
gosub "CheckMullionStyle" ! -> bNoMullion, bNoMullionSize, bSidelightDivision, bNoGlass, bNoSashFrame, bSolidPanel bLockMullionParams = bNoMullion bLockMullionSizeParams = bNoMullionSize bLockGlassParams = bNoGlass bLockSashFrameParams = bNoSashFrame bLockSidelightDivisionParams = not(bSidelightDivision) bLockSolidPanelParams = not(bSolidPanel) bLockVentPanelParams = not(bVentPanel) else bLockMullionParams = 1 bLockMullionSizeParams = 1 bLockGlassParams = 1 bLockSashFrameParams = 1 bLockSidelightDivisionParams = 1 bLockSolidPanelParams = 1 bLockVentPanelParams = 1 for i = 1 to 10 if sashID[i][SASH_FUNCTION] > 0 then CasementID = sashID[i][SASH_ID] gosub "CheckMullionStyle" ! -> bNoMullion, bNoMullionSize, bSidelightDivision, bNoGlass, bNoSashFrame, bSolidPanel bLockMullionParams = (bLockMullionParams & bNoMullion) bLockMullionSizeParams = (bLockMullionSizeParams & bNoMullionSize) bLockGlassParams = (bLockGlassParams & bNoGlass) bLockSashFrameParams = (bLockSashFrameParams & bNoSashFrame) bLockSidelightDivisionParams = (bLockSidelightDivisionParams & not(bSidelightDivision)) bLockSolidPanelParams = (bLockSolidPanelParams & not(bSolidPanel)) bLockVentPanelParams = (bLockVentPanelParams & not(bVentPanel)) endif next i endif
goto "MasterEnd"
! ============================================================================= ! Check Mullion Style ! =============================================================================
"CheckMullionStyle": if CasementID = 0 then bNoMullion = (iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_NONE |\ iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_CUSTOM |\ iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_SOLID_PANEL |\ iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_VENT_PANEL) bNoMullionSize = (iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_NONE |\ iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_CUSTOM |\ iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_DIVIDED_FRAME |\ iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_SOLID_PANEL |\ iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_VENT_PANEL) bSidelightDivision = (iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_DIVIDED_FRAME) bNoGlass = (iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_CUSTOM | iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_SOLID_PANEL | iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_VENT_PANEL) bNoSashFrame = (iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_CUSTOM | iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_SOLID_PANEL) bDivided = (iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_DIVIDED) bSolidGlazed = (iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_SOLID_GLAZED) bSolidPanel = (iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_SOLID_PANEL) bVentPanel = (iMullionStyle_00 = MULLION_VENT_PANEL) endif if CasementID = 1 then bNoMullion = (iMullionStyle_01 = MULLION_NONE |\ iMullionStyle_01 = MULLION_CUSTOM |\ iMullionStyle_01 = MULLION_SOLID_PANEL |\ iMullionStyle_01 = MULLION_VENT_PANEL) bNoMullionSize = (iMullionStyle_01 =
